channel.title: Data Science on Jameson's Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in Data Science on Jameson's Portfolio

item.title: LA Neighborhood Scores
item.description: Table of Contents Introduction Workflow Pileine Data Processing Feature Extraction Data Wrangling Storing Individual Datasets Data Merging - SparkSQL Firebase Web Application Conclusion Data Sources Goals Introduction The City of Los Angeles, home to nearly 4 million residents, is a trailblazer in many aspects, including data transparency.

item.title: Predicting Statistical Causes of Wildfires
item.description: Table of Contents Introduction Goals Notebook Prediction Graphs Conclusion Introduction This dataset is a spatial database of historical wildfires in the United States from 1992 to 2015.

item.title: Amazon Recommender
item.description: – Will Update Visuals I led two fellow students to develop a Python recomendation system for suggesting ratings for a user’s review through collabortive filters and machine learning algorithms achieving our highest accuracy of 89%.
